entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle and Fog, 0.9°C

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to periods of rain mixed with snow this evening. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm inland. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Monday 16 May 2016
